properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. TEN METER S/V CIELO, CREAM HULL,
   ONE PERSON ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
   IN 27-18.18S 011-29.30E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
   REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
   IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO CAPE TOWN RADIO,
   PHONE: 272 1551 0700,
   E-MAIL: MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA
   OR MRCC CAPE TOWN, PHONE: 272 1938 3300,
   E-MAIL: MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1044/16.
